issue.title: [R] Expand on schema/colnames mismatch error messages
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15480](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15480). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In ARROW-14744 extra checks were added for when `open_dataset()` is used and there are conflicts between column names from the schema vs. passed in explicitly - we should expand on the messaging and tests for the different possible cases here.
